title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This versatile cleaning tool is perfect for hard floors and area rugs, making it a must-have addition to your home cleaning routine.

Featuring a rotating brush system, this vacuum cleaner effectively cleans all types of surfaces with ease. The cleaning path width of 10.5 inches ensures that you can cover a large area in less time, while the swivel head allows for easy maneuverability around furniture and obstacles. Plus, with its carry handle, you can effortlessly transport it from room to room.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, providing up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time. Say goodbye to tangled cords and enjoy the freedom to clean anywhere in your home. 

With its improved edge cleaning capabilities, this vacuum cleaner ensures that no dirt or debris is left behind, even in hard-to-reach areas. The wifi-connected feature allows you to stay connected and control the device through the BISSELL Connect app, making cleaning more convenient than ever.

Not only does the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max deliver exceptional cleaning performance, but it also supports a great cause. With every purchase, you are supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, making a difference in the lives of pets in need.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max comes with several included accessories to enhance your cleaning experience. You'll receive 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls. These accessories ensure that you have everything you need to achieve a thorough and deep clean on various surfaces.

Don't miss out on the convenience and efficiency of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Get yours today and experience a new level of clean!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This versatile cleaning tool is designed to tackle hard floors and area rugs with ease. With its sleek black finish, this vacuum cleaner and mop not only cleans your floors but also adds a touch of style to your home.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max features a rotating brush system that effectively removes dirt and debris from your floors. Its cleaning path width of 10.5 inches ensures quick and efficient cleaning, saving you time and effort. The swivel head and carry handle make it easy to maneuver around furniture and transport the cleaner wherever you need it.

Say goodbye to tangled cords and limited mobility with the cordless design of this vacuum cleaner and mop. Powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, it provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time on a single charge, giving you plenty of time to clean your entire home. The improved edge cleaning feature ensures that no dirt or debris is left behind, leaving your floors looking spotless.

Not only is the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max a powerful cleaning tool, but it also supports a great cause. BISSELL Pet Foundation is the charity supported by this product, so you can feel good about your purchase knowing that a portion of the proceeds goes towards helping pets in need.

This all-in-one cleaner is compatible with a wide range of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. It comes with two multi-surface trial formulas, two hard floor sanitize trial formulas, and two multi-surface brush rolls, providing everything you need to get started.

Experience the convenience and effectiveness of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Order yours today and enjoy cleaner floors and a cleaner conscience knowing you're supporting a worthy cause.

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This powerful cleaning tool is designed to effortlessly tackle hard floors and area rugs, leaving them spotless and fresh.

With its rotating brush system and a cleaning path width of 10.5 inches, the BISSELL CrossWave ensures thorough and efficient cleaning. The improved edge cleaning feature ensures that no dirt or debris is left behind, even in hard-to-reach areas.

This cordless vacuum cleaner and mop offers unmatched convenience. The cordless design allows you to move freely without any restrictions, and the battery, powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion, provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time. Say goodbye to tangled cords and limited mobility!

The BISSELL CrossWave is not just a cleaning powerhouse, but it also supports a great cause. By purchasing this product, you are contributing to the BISSELL Pet Foundation, which helps pets in need. It's a win-win situation!

This all-in-one cleaner is compatible with various surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. No matter what type of flooring you have, the BISSELL CrossWave can handle it all.

The cleaner features a self-cleaning cycle and a swivel head for easy maneuverability. It also comes with a carry handle for effortless transportation and a WiFi-connected capability for added convenience. The BISSELL Connect app allows you to control and monitor your cleaning sessions.

The BISSELL CrossWave includes two Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, two Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and two Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, ensuring that you have everything you need to achieve a pristine clean.

Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for a hassle-free and effective cleaning experience. Order now and enjoy the convenience and power of this remarkable cleaning tool!
